channel.title: Adobe Programs
channel.description: Well I have found that both Adobe Photoshop and Adobe bridge will work with a cracked amplib.dll file... Would this work for every Adobe CS6 program?

item.title: Adobe Programs
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Alec_, post:2, topic:447539”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=550421.msg4034451#msg4034451 date=1341077958]

we don’t support discussion of warez here

Mods don’t care about this type of thing, if its something they disagree with then we don’t discuss it (lul).
[/quote]

cool. we still don’t support discussion of warez. I think I’m more aware of what’s allowed and what’s not seeing as you just got here less than a year ago, thanks

@ topic

[quote author=silabsoft link=topic=550558.msg4035186#msg4035186 date=1341138378]
get a job and buy it.
[/quote][/quote]
We? Don’t include me in this we, and don’t include most of the people in this thread as we okay, hunnii?

Just because I didn’t interact with the community at first didn’t mean I wasn’t using this site, I have like 100 post count on r-serv but I have 2 days logged time with them - same situation as with moparscape, I didn’t feel the need to post or have social interaction. I never got here 1 year ago, I started being active here 1 year ago, get yo facts right. If I got here 1 year ago I’d of made an account 1 year ago.
Also, I’m more active within moparscape if your compare our post counts, which is over 10x. But anyways none of that information is relevent in my opinion I just brung it up since you brung up statistical information.

Things aren’t black and white. We’re not supposed to play rs (or something can’t remember what and cba checking) but this site is based on rs? So whats not aloud here a lot of the time had a blind eye turned to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Adobe Programs
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Scyth_, post:6, topic:447526”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=550421.msg4034926#msg4034926 date=1341107717]

Just download a cracked version of whatever adobe you want from TPB?

Why would you do that when you can get a ‘legit’ version with 1 cracked file? Besides, there could be a virus packed into one of those things at TPB. You never know.
[/quote]

Like fridder said, and yeah it worked, iv’e cracked the whole adobe cs6 master collection, exept for encore[/quote]
Make a guide on how to do that? I’m sure everyone will appreciate it <3. I never download cracks, I’m very suspicious of them.

Read full topic
